newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Hefei Pesticide applies to issue 50 mln A shares.
newsitem.headline: Hefei Pesticide applies to issue 50 mln A shares.

text.p: Hefei Pesticide and Seed Co Ltd has filed an application with the China Securities Regulatory Commission to issue 50 million A shares and list them in Shenzhen, a company official said on Thursday.
The company, based in Hefei, capital of eastern Anhui province, produces seeds and pesticides he told the Hong Kong-based newsletter China Securities Bulletin.
Anhui Securities Co Ltd has been named as the main underwriter for the share offer, the official said.
Hefei Pesticide, which has total share capital of 60 million state shares, will use the proceeds in its main operations, he said.
The company estimates its 1996 post-tax profits at 36 million yuan against 30 million yuan in 1995, the official said. He did not give a forecast for 1997.
